section.p: A Referenced Frames Observation is used if the referenced DICOM SOP instance is a multiframe image and the reference does not apply to all frames. The list of integer values for the referenced frames of a DICOM multiframe image SOP instance is contained in a Boundary Observation nested inside this class.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:9277)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="121190" Referenced Frames (CodeSystem: 1.2.840.10008.2.16.4 DCM) (CONF:9278)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] boundaryObservation (CONF:9279, CONF:9280, CONF:9281)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Boundary Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.11)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:9277)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="121190" Referenced Frames (CodeSystem: 1.2.840.10008.2.16.4 DCM) (CONF:9278)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] boundaryObservation (CONF:9279, CONF:9280, CONF:9281)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Boundary Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.11)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd" classCode="ROIBND" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.10"/> <id root="724897017"/> <code code="121190" codeSystem="1.2.840.10008.2.16.4" codeSystemName="DCM" displayName="Referenced Frames"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.11"/> <id root="331945270"/> <code code="113036" codeSystem="1.2.840.10008.2.16.4" codeSystemName="DCM" displayName="Frames for Display"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation>
